definition: the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Er water side edge, the blood was buried in the autumn flowers, not hae atonement.
sentences.chinese: 洱水畔边，血葬秋花，赎不尽前尘的罪。

sentences.english: My thoughts still cling to the moldering Past.
sentences.chinese: 我的思绪依然牵挂着前尘旧梦。

sentences.english: The fugacious past destined to be my single vermilion mark.
sentences.chinese: 飘渺前尘，注定只成为我一个人的朱砂墨迹。

sentences.english: I look back on the way I was then a young stupid kid who committed that terrible crime.
sentences.chinese: 我回首前尘往事，那个犯下重罪的小笨蛋。

sentences.english: But Sima Xi had forgot all the past.
sentences.chinese: 而司马樨对前尘往事俱已忘却。

sentences.english: You muse namely the utter creature dictator knew this matter, the appointment was equitable floor your before incarnation mirror?
sentences.chinese: 你以为神帝知道此事，会只是碎了你的前尘镜吗？

sentences.english: Don't mention that again; it has become a memory.
sentences.chinese: 别再提那事了，都已经是前尘往事了。

sentences.english: Thus much of thee can still restore.

definition: the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
the past is vanished like the wind; gone beyond recall
separated by a generation/a lifetime ago
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
